verbs.description: North Korea [V: is] rapidly moving the goalposts for next month 's summit between leader Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump , saying the United States must stop insisting it unilaterally abandon its nuclear program and stop talking about a Libya - style solution to the standoff .
